body.name: [270°Adjustable Stand] Mini projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, Outdoor Portable Movie Projector 1080P Support, Auto Keystone Home Projector for Phone/TV Stick/Laptop, WiMiUS Latest S27
body.stockDetail: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
features: 🌟【270° Built-in Stand & All in One Hand】More stable triangular stand, allowing you to effortlessly adjust the angle for the perfect viewing experience. With a net weight of just 1.32 lb, small but not simple, instantly project your movie further onto the ceiling. Take it anywhere, and savor high-quality visuals, whether you're indoors or enjoying an outdoor movie night.

🌟【Superior 1.26:1 Projection Throw Ratio & Zoom】Whether you're in a cozy attic, bedroom, RV, or a larger space, this mini projector seamlessly adapts to your environment. Compared to others, it saves you 1.74 ft of distance for a 100" screen. Offering a projection size range of 40~200 inches with distances from 3.6ft to 17.7ft, it has 4:3 and 16:9 aspect ratios and 85% zoom out for a versatile viewing experience.

🌟【Auto Keystone Correction & 1080P Supported】Say farewell to distorted images with our auto vertical keystone correction, enjoying your home theater without alignment concerns. With 1080P supported resolution and remarkable 15000:1 high dynamic contrast ratio, it faithfully reproduces real color content. Additionally, benefit from convenient features like Online Update(OTA), Auto Sleep mode, and Brightness & Color Temperature Adjustment.

🌟【2.4G/5G Dual Band WiFi & Bluetooth 5.2】Dual assurance with both 5G and 2.4G speedy WiFi options, along with dependable wired connections. In addition to wireless screen mirroring through Miracast and Airplay, S27 supports wired screen mirroring, enabling seamless YouTube streaming under a wired connection. Connect Bluetooth headphones, speakers, or AirPods more stably with Bluetooth 5.2.

❤️️【Versatile Interfaces & Worry-free Shopping】Equipped with HDMI, USB, and 3.5mm audio port, S27 projector easily connects to your Phone, Laptop, PC, TV Stick, PS5, or Switch. Plus, it makes a perfect gift for birthdays, Christmas, and New Year celebrations. ➤Note: S27 is not battery-powered and needs to to be plugged in during use.➤For any questions, our 24/7 after-sales email support, 2-year Money Back guarantee, 3-year Repair warranty, and Lifetime Technical Support are at your service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great 1080P projector for an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This WiMiUS is jam packed projector for a low price point. It provides an good looking, sharp, vivid 1080P picture which looks great in a dark room where the colors can really pop. In a semi lit room this projector is still bright enough that you can still enjoy it. I am using this projector to replace an older one for outdoor movies and gaming and occasional indoor use, such as projecting holiday images and movies in the front windows.This feature packed projector really hits the mark with features like auto correction, Bluetooth, wifi, screen cast, hdmi, USB power and USB data. The auto correction features makes the setup alot easier. This projector also has a good throw ratio, I was able to use my 100 inch screen from just about 10 feet away from the projector to fill the screen. I used a 4k firestick on this and the on-board power supplied from the USB slots was more then enough, which allievated me having to use a splitter or running another extension cord.I ran this projector through all my standard tests with any new tv, projector, etc. Including 4k movies, such as Top Gun (as seen in the video), 4k tuning video from YouTube to check for color correction (as seen in the video), casting from my cell phone, etc. This projector preformed very well with the default settings and the image was very clear and crisp. Even in fast action sceens I didn't notice any ghosting.The audio on this is also surprising good. I usually the audio through a 5.1 surround whenever I use it, but it would more then suffice if you don't have any external audio or a bluetooth speaker. The voices were very clear and it even had a bit of audio the low end which was surprising.This project is also quite a bit smaller and lighter then any of my previous projectors. This makes it easy to move around.Overall this projector is a great option for those looking for an affordable projector for occasional or daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big Value in a Small Package
reviews.reviewText: The WiMiUS portable mini projector is a compact and versatile projector only 6.5 inches long that delivers impressive performance in a small package. With its sleek design and lightweight construction, it's perfect for on-the-go entertainment. The projector boasts a bright display with sharp image quality. Its user-friendly interface and intuitive controls allow for easy setup, on the Android you simply go to settings>connected devices>Smart View, once device is selected select it and you are in business.. The built-in speakers produce decent sound, although I connected my blue tooth BOSE speakers. The only drawback worth mentioning is the power cord, which could benefit from being longer for more flexible placement. Overall, the WiMiUS portable mini projector offers excellent value for its price, delivering reliable performance and entertainment wherever you go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a nice portable projector!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The Wimius 2023 projector is a budget-friendly projector that offers a number of features that make it a good option for home entertainment. It also has an auto keystone correction feature, which automatically adjusts the image if the projector is not perfectly aligned.It is also equipped with WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity, so you can easily connect it to your smartphone, tablet, or laptop. It also has a built-in speaker, but you can also connect it to external speakers for better sound.Here are some of the pros and consPros:·High resolution·300 ANSI lumens brightness·Auto keystone correction·WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity·Built-in speaker·Affordable priceCons:·Not as bright as some other 4K projectors·Lacks some advanced features, such as 4K support and HDROverall, this projector is a good option for those looking for a budget-friendly projector with a number of features. It is not the brightest projector on the market, but it is still bright enough for most rooms. It also has a number of features that make it easy to set up and use, such as the auto keystone correction features.If you are looking for a projector for a small to medium-sized room and you are on a budget, it is a good option to consider.Here are some additional things to consider when purchasing the Wimius 2023 projector:The projector is relatively lightweight and portable, so you can easily move it from room to room.I hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great projector and super portable!
reviews.reviewText: The design is sleek and the 270° adjustable stand is a thoughtful touch and the functionality is impressive. The WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity is seamless, which is important since I don't like dealing with a tangle of wires.In terms of image quality, the 1080P support does not disappoint: the visuals are crisp and vibrant, although--as expected with most mini projectors--the clarity is best in low-light conditions. The auto keystone feature is a clever addition, ensuring the picture isn't skewed, even when the projector isn't perfectly aligned.The sound from the built-in speakers is adequate, but for a more enveloping audio experience (particularly for outdoor viewings), I'd recommend external speakers. From a user perspective, it's quite intuitive. Durability-wise, it seems robust enough for regular use. It is also super quiet, the fan noise is minimal and almost non-existent.Overall, the S27 is a fantastic choice for anyone looking for a portable, easy-to-use projector with quality visual output. It's probably ideal for a casual movie night, but I suppose it could also be suitable for a professional presentation. Just bear in mind that, for the ultimate audio-visual experience, you might want to invest in some additional accessories, such as an HDMI adapter. For example, some platforms (e.g., Netflix) are not compatible with the projector via the "mirroring" feature but a workaround is to use a TV stick such as firestick. Ultimately, I'd recommend it for home use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a great product and delivered more than what is written in the product description. Initially I was hesitant to buy thinking could try other product which is more costly but then I tried this which is less cheaper and delivered me best quality.Setting up was really hassle free. Very good brightness and gives us a mini theatre feel.Loved the performance under and casting from mobile is like button clicks.It's also a good choice as a gaming projector. The projector links to laptop very quickly with no lag. It's great to use this small projector to play games with friends on weekend nights. Small size saves space, the screen is adjustable, both scaling and automatic vertical correction are very good, and you can front projection rear projection or hanging, diversified choices. Home office can also be used for some business activities. Exceeded my expectations, novel appearance, stable bracket, high weekend usage video projector!A highly recommended product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Eine persönliche Meinung zum echten Wert
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Okay, Leute, lasst mich euch meine persönliche Meinung dazu geben, was ich kürzlich in die Finger bekommen habe. Ich habe schon einige Beamer ausprobiert, aber dieser hier ist in dieser Preisklasse wirklich revolutionär.Beeindruckende Bilder: Kennt ihr das, wenn manche Beamer irgendwie zu dunkel sind? Nicht dieses Teil. Er ist super hell mit guten Farben. Filme darauf zu schauen fühlt sich an, als hätte man sein eigenes kleines Kino, besonders mit seiner Full-HD-Unterstützung.Spielfertig: Und da wir gerade von Filmen sprechen, ich habe auch das Spielen ausprobiert, und es gibt kaum Verzögerungen. Alles läuft reibungslos.Großbild-Feeling: Dieser Beamer kann ein großes Bild anzeigen, wie auf den Fotos zu sehen ist. Ob Filmabende mit Freunden oder beim Camping? Das Erlebnis wird auf ein ganz neues Level gehoben!Super einfache Verbindung: Das Einrichten von WiFi und die Verbindung waren kinderleicht.Klangqualität: Ach ja, die eingebauten Lautsprecher? Viel besser als ich erwartet hatte. Natürlich kann man den Klang immer mit externen Bluetooth-Lautsprechern aufpeppen, wenn man den Kinoklang sucht.Nicht nur zum Spaß: Ich habe es für eine Arbeitspräsentation ausprobiert (Vorteile des Homeoffice), und es war ein Erfolg. Einfach meinen USB-Stick mit der Präsentation eingesteckt, und los ging's.Dauerhafter Wert: Man sagt, die Lampe dieses Geräts könne bis zu 200.000 Stunden halten. Wenn das stimmt, dann lohnt sich die Investition definitiv. Und mit einem ziemlich soliden Garantieangebot fühle ich mich ziemlich sicher bei meinem Kauf.Kurz gesagt? Wenn ihr euch unsicher seid wegen diesem Beamer, würde ich sagen, probiert es aus. Es ist nicht nur irgendein gehyptes Gadget; es hält wirklich, was es verspricht. Die Technologie hat sich so weit entwickelt, dass man für wenig Geld diese Qualität bekommt. Ob ihr Filmfans, Spieler seid oder ihn sogar für die Arbeit braucht, dieser hier ist ein Keeper. Ich hoffe, das hilft!

The media could not be loaded. Der Beamer wurde sehr schnell geliefert und mit allem was man braucht. Zunächst einmal ist das Preis/Leistungsverhältnis unschlagbar. Man bekommt hier eine erstaunliche Menge an Funktionen und Qualität für sein Geld.Die Bildqualität ist beeindruckend. Die Farben sind lebendig, die Details gestochen scharf, und die Helligkeit ist mehr als ausreichend. Es fühlt sich wirklich an, als hätte man sein eigenes kleines Kino im Wohnzimmer. Einige Bilder und ein Video Aufzeichnung mitgeteilt.Die Lautsprecherqualität ist überraschend gut. Der Ton ist klar und verständlich, und die Lautstärke reicht für mittelgroße Räume aus. Natürlich kann man bei Bedarf externe Lautsprecher verwenden, aber die internen Lautsprecher erfüllen ihren Zweck hervorragend.Ein besonderes Highlight ist die einfache Kopplung mit IOS Geräten. Die Verbindung über WiFi verläuft reibungslos, sodass man schnell und unkompliziert Inhalte von seinen iPhone oder iPads auf den Beamer übertragen kann.Insgesamt bin ich absolut begeistert von diesem Beamer. Das Preis/Leistungsverhältnis, die Bildqualität, die Lautsprecherqualität und die einfache Kopplung mit IOS Geräten machen ihn zu einer ausgezeichneten Wahl für ein Heimkinoerlebnis, das einem echten Kino in nichts nachsteht.

reviews.reviewTitle: とても綺麗で音もよし
reviews.reviewText: 自宅の映画鑑賞用に購入。4K対応ということもあり、画質はいいです。音もよく、Bluetoothに対応しているので家族が寝ていてもワイヤレスイヤホンで鑑賞できるのもいいです。収納ケースがあったらなおよかったです。
